thread.title: A little easter egg I found.

post.author: SladeEXE
post.body:
Just for fun I decided to look at the weapon textures and found this.
Which got me wondering, what are the official name of all the weapons?
So far I got this:
UAC 1102 (Pistol) I think.
IDKFA 666 (Shotgun)
MG-88 Enforcer (Machinegun)
Mach 2 (Chaingun)

post.author: SladeEXE
